data.text: @james_e_b_ At least when facing Genghis Khan the commoners could still buy lattes using Apple Pay
Elites avoiding suffering in war is one of the most widely understood features of war, it's even in sitcoms https://t.co/i3QZ0kX93t
@james_e_b_ Maybe we should've let him think that omicron sub-variant was going to kill everyone in Denmark.

@james_e_b_ What's the timeline for "modern"? It's subjective. Maybe it includes WWI.
But if it's now vs WWI, yeah it is ludicrous

@james_e_b_ On brand with the crowd that has never been able to put a pandemic in proper historical context. His type have spent the past two years framing COVID as a distinctly modern crisis of selfish behavior.
@james_e_b_ He is just trolling now - right? right?
